Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Oakley
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee  buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Damen ,North Ave., Western and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee  buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Damen ,North Ave., Western and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley.

Allow extra travel time.
